title: Tiny Item-Item Recommender
description: A minimal item-item collaborative filtering demo built in Python. It uses cosine similarity to recommend items based on user preferences — a clean, lightweight approach to understanding recommendation systems.

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: A visual exploration of classic sorting algorithms like Merge, Bubble, and Quick Sort. Built with JavaScript, it animates each step to make the logic behind sorting intuitive and interactive.
alt: Bars animating during a sorting algorithm

title: Weather Insights
description: A data-driven Python app that fetches and visualizes weather data from APIs, providing summaries, insights, and trends in a clean, accessible format.

title: C++ CSV Stats
description: A C++ utility that parses CSV files and computes key statistics like mean, median, and variance. Fast, efficient, and designed for data-heavy workflows.

title: Image → ASCII
description: A Python project that converts images into ASCII art using Pillow and NumPy. It’s a creative blend of image processing and coding aesthetics.
